subject: Soccer
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: FIFA has barred Argentina Coach Diego Maradona from all soccer activities for two months for his expletive-filled rants after his team qualified for the 2010 World Cup.
snippet: FIFA has barred Argentina Coach Diego Maradona from all soccer activities for two months for his expletive-filled rants after his team qualified for the 2010 World Cup.
